selected_quotes: Free full text: Genotype frequencies of gene polymorphisms in #chronicfatiguesyndrome/#ME
#citeagrf Prevalence of TRPM3 ion channel and mAChM3R SNP genotypes in patients with Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
NCNED's research published at Journal of Immunology and Immunogenetics Insights on 14 Feb 16. #MEcfs
It's beyond me but some of you scientists might get value from it #MECFS #invisibleillness #pwme

citation.title: Genotype Frequencies of Transient Receptor Potential Melastatin M3 Ion Channels and Acetylcholine Muscarinic M3 Receptor Gene Polymorphisms in Chronic Fatigue Syndrome/Myalgic Encephalomyelitis Patients

author.name: Immunology Jnl
author.description: Immunology and Immunogenetics Insights, an open access journal published by Libertas Academica.

author.name: Tom Kindlon
author.description: Have M.E. 28 yrs, housebound 23 yrs. 95% of tweets on #MyalgicE or #ChronicIllness. Follow field closely: 22 publications in peer-reviewed journals. #MEcfs #CFS

author.name: Paul Watton
author.description: Devoted husband to Deb - who I stole from a Greek island. To understand my Twitter handle & why Naxos is special to me, read this: http://bit.ly/1p7nDHO

author.name: ME nieuws
author.description:
Updates about latest scientific developments and news about ME
Updates over laatste wetenschappelijke ontwikkelingen en nieuwsberichten m.b.t. ME

author.name: 1000yd Stare
author.description: CFS/ME/Depression. Taking each day as it comes. One at a time! Onwards and upwards. Carpe diem. Ex-RAF

author.name: Rachel M
author.description:
Living with moderately severe ME, CFS, and OI. 
Retired accountant due to illness.

author.name: InvestinME Research
author.description: An independent UK charity campaigning for biomedical research into ME and providing funding and better education and awareness of this disease.

author.name: Snowy
author.description: Animagus. Hearty but not hale (PwME). Celebrant of beautiful action. Denouncer of injustice. Likes bicycles.

author.name: John Duncan
author.description:
"The idea that to make a man work you've got to hold gold in front of his eyes is a growth, not an axiom."
—This Side of Paradise.

author.name: AGRF
author.description: A not-for-profit, full service genomics capability, providing access to a national network of state-of-the-art facilities, technology, expertise and innovation.
